import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, DialogBackdrop, DialogPanel, DialogTitle } from '@headlessui/react' import useStore from "../useStore" const Section = () => { const { data,fectPost } = useStore((state) => ({ data: state.data, fectPost: state.fectPost })); const [isCommentVisible, setIsCommentVisible] = useState(false); const [count, setCount] = useState(10); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const handleCommentClick = () => { setIsCommentVisible(!isCommentVisible); }; const handleClick = () => { setCount((prevData) => prevData + 1) } const Begeni = () => { if (!open) { setOpen(true); } } useEffect(()=>{fectPost()},[]) return (
